text: Nihsansaya, imanadharakanvara allahaca motha upakara ahe ki tyane tyancyatunaca eka rasula tyancyamadhye pathavila, jo tyanna allahacya ayati vacuna aikavito ani tyanna paka (pavitra) karato, ani tyanna grantha ani akalecya gosti sikavito ani nihsansaya, he sarva tyapurvi ughadapane bhatakalele hote
